result.eng: Did you finish the work?

result.ponchtml: Ar ċríoċnaiġ tú an obairDid you finish the work?

result.eng: The work will be easier after a while.
result.ga: Beidh an obair níos éasca tar éis tamaill

result.html: Beidh an obair níos éasca tar éis tamaillThe work will be easier after a while.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ an obair níos éasca tar éis tamaillThe work will be easier after a while.

result.eng: The work will be delayed by a week.

result.eng: Continous work will be involved to reach the target.

result.eng: The men were able to work hard.
result.ga: Bhí na fir in ann obair go crua

result.ponchtml: Ḃí na fir in ann obair go cruaThe men were able to work hard.

result.eng: She was mad when she heard the work hadn't been done.

result.html: Bhí sí ar buile nuair a chuala sí nach raibh an obair déantaShe was mad when she heard the work hadn't been done.

result.eng: We spent a year and a half doing that work.

result.eng: I usually work late at night.

result.eng: I spent a year doing that work.

result.eng: She concentrated completely on the work.

result.eng: As it happens, I work in the same company.

result.eng: I didn't get recognition for my work.

result.eng: I am not unemployed, I work.

result.ponchtml: Níl mé in ann post a ḟáilI am unable to find work.

result.eng: He's not at home, he's at work.

result.eng: I admire your work.

result.eng: I work in a factory.

result.eng: I am going over [literally, "eastwards"] to Galway today after work.

result.html: Cé is údar don saothar sárluachmhar seoWho is the author of this exceedingly valuable work?
result.ponchtml: Cé is údar don saoṫar sárluaċṁar seoWho is the author of this exceedingly valuable work?

result.eng: The advantange of work experience programs is that you learn the work by doing it.
result.ga: Tá sé de bhua ag na cláir thaithí oibre go bhfaighidh tú eolas ar an obair trí í a dhéanamh
result.orig: Tá sé de bhua ag na cláir thaithí oibre go bhfaighidh tú eolas ar an obair trí í a dhéanamh
result.html: Tá sé de bhua ag na cláir thaithí oibre go bhfaighidh tú eolas ar an obair trí í a dhéanamhThe advantange of work experience programs is that you learn the work by doing it.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé de ḃua ag na cláir ṫaiṫí oibre go ḃfaiġiḋ tú eolas ar an obair trí í a ḋéanaṁThe advantange of work experience programs is that you learn the work by doing it.

result.eng: I don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
result.ga: Níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas Tá mé i mo sháith den tsaol
result.orig: Níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas Tá mé i mo sháith den tsaol
result.html: Níl feidhm orm aon lá oibre a dhéanamh le mo sholas Tá mé i mo sháith den tsaolI don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
result.ponchtml: Níl feiḋm orm aon lá oibre a ḋéanaṁ le mo ẛolas Tá mé i mo ẛáiṫ den tsaolI don't have to work a single day for as long as I live. I am rich.
